quest: What do you have to pay tax on in the UK?
quest_zh: 您必須在英國繳稅什麼？

quest: Select TWO early members of the Royal Society
quest_zh: 選擇皇家學會的兩個早期成員

quest: Many schools organise events to raise money for extra equipment or out-of-school activities
quest_zh: 許多學校組織活動以籌集資金，以供額外的設備或校外活動

quest: What is the 'Grand National'?
quest_zh: 什麼是“大國”？

quest: In Scotland, judges developed 'common law' by following previous decisions. It was reffered to as 'unwritten'
quest_zh: 在蘇格蘭，法官通過遵循以前的決定制定了“普通法”。它被稱為“不成文”

quest: In Northern Ireland, minor cases are heard by a District Judge or Deputy District Judge, who is legally qualified and paid
quest_zh: 在北愛爾蘭，地方法院法官或副地方法官審理了次要案件，他們具有法律資格並支付

quest: On Valentine's Day people exchange gifts and cards and send anonymous cards to people they secretly admire
quest_zh: 在情人節，人們交換禮物和卡片，並向他們暗中佩服的人發送匿名卡

quest: What should all new citizens do as part of the citizenship ceremony?
quest_zh: What should all new citizens do as part of the citizenship ceremony?

answers.answer: Swear or affirm loyalty to the King (or Queen)
answers.answer_zh: Swear or affirm loyalty to the King (or Queen)

answers.answer: Prepare and make an individual speech during the ceremony
answers.answer_zh: Prepare and make an individual speech during the ceremony

quest: In the 20th century, what did Sir Edwin Lutyens design to be the seat of government in India?
quest_zh: 在20世紀，Edwin Lutyens爵士的設計是印度政府的所在地？

quest: Nowadays, the House of Commons has more power than the House of Lords
quest_zh: 如今，下議院擁有比上議院更多的權力

quest: What is the correct order of the Patron Saints' Days? (Starting from January)
quest_zh: 守護神時代的正確順序是什麼？ （從一月開始）

answers.answer: St George's Day, St David's Day, St Patrick's Day, St Andrew's Day
answers.answer_zh: 聖喬治節，聖帕特里克節，聖安德魯節

answers.answer: St David's Day, St Patrick's Day, St George's Day, St Andrew's Day
answers.answer_zh: 聖帕特里克節的聖大衛節，聖喬治節，聖安德魯日

answers.answer: St Patrick's Day, St David's Day, St Andrew's Day, St George's Day
answers.answer_zh: 聖帕特里克節，聖安德魯日，聖喬治節

answers.answer: St David's Day, St Patrick's Day, St Andrew's Day, St George's Day
answers.answer_zh: 聖帕特里克節的聖大衛節，聖安德魯日，聖喬治節

quest: What are Halloween lanterns traditionally made out of?
quest_zh: 傳統上，萬聖節燈籠是什麼？

quest: Who is the next heir to the throne?
quest_zh: 誰是王位的下一個繼承人？

quest: A 60 second silence is observed on the Remembrance Day
quest_zh: 在紀念日觀察到60秒的沉默

quest: On what day does 'Lent' begin?
quest_zh: “借”開始哪一天？

quest: What is the origin of Parliament?
quest_zh: 議會的起源是什麼？

quest: What system can be used to complete a tax return if you are self-employed?
quest_zh: 如果您是自僱，可以使用哪種系統來完成納稅申報表？

quest: The UN was set up straight after the First World War. It now has over 190 countries as members
quest_zh: 聯合國在第一次世界大戰後直接成立。現在，它擁有190多個國家的成員

quest: A very impressive hill fort can still be seen today at Maiden Castle, what English county does it stand in?
quest_zh: 今天仍然可以在少女城堡（Maiden Castle）看到一個非常令人印象深刻的山堡，它站在哪個英國縣？

quest: Members in the Welsh Assembly can speak English and Welsh, and all publications of the Assembly are in both languages
quest_zh: 威爾士議會的成員可以說英語和威爾士語，並且大會的所有出版物均以兩種語言

quest: What method is used to elect UK MPs?
quest_zh: 哪種方法可以選舉英國議員？

quest: Who makes a speech which summarises the government's policies for the year ahead?
quest_zh: 誰發表演講，總結了政府未來一年的政策？

quest: Why is 1928 an important date for women's rights?
quest_zh: 為什麼1928年是婦女權利的重要日期？

answers.answer: Women could vote at 18, the same age as men
answers.answer_zh: 婦女可以在18歲時投票，年齡與男性相同

answers.answer: Women could vote at 21, the same age as men
answers.answer_zh: 婦女可以在21歲時投票，年齡與男性相同

answers.answer: Women could vote if they were over 30 years old
answers.answer_zh: 婦女如果30歲以上可以投票

quest: The European Convention on Human Rights is incorporated into UK law
quest_zh: 《歐洲人權公約》納入英國法律
